Key Match Events: CJ McCollum scored 25 points, leading the Pelicans in scoring.
Dejounte Murray recorded a double-double with 10 rebounds and 12 assists.
Trey Murphy III contributed significantly with 22 points and a notable putback dunk.
Yves Missi had a transition dunk and a key block against Kyle Kuzma.
Trey Murphy III hit a deep triple to close the half.
Herb Jones was active on defense, making significant plays.
Post-Match Reflections: Willie Green emphasized the importance of defense in the win against the Wizards.
